name: Miami Vice
description: A cocktail made with a blend of a Pi√±a Colada and a Strawberry Daiquiri. Not only a drink to satisfy a sweet tooth, but the beautiful red and white pattern is enough to turn heads.
directions: In a blender, add strawberries, lime juice, simple syrup, half the rum (1 oz) and half the ice (1 cup).
Blend until smooth and pour into glass.
Clean the blender or get a second blender.
In the blender add cream of coconut, pineapple juice, the remaining rum (1 oz) and the remaining ice (1 cup).
Blend until smooth and pour into glass with the first blend.
(Optional) Add a cherry and / or pineapple slice to garnish.
